Company

Home / Company

«VOBKENT TOLA KLASTER» LLC

LLC "VOBKENT TOLA KLASTER" - a dynamically developing, modern textile enterprise - was established in 2019 as a result of the optimal combination of such investment components as:

Availability of high quality basic raw materials - high grades of cotton fiber grown in the most favorable regions of the Republic of Uzbekistan, which is a fundamental aspect in the development of integrated production;

Availability and sufficiency of energy resources;

Availability of qualified specialists in the textile industry;

Accumulated production capital of the investor; In a short production period, our spinning mill has established itself in the domestic and international market as a manufacturer of quality coarse yarns. Applying modern technologies in production, setting strict requirements for products and paying special attention to quality control at every stage of prod uction, LLC "VOB KENT TOLA KLASTER" constantly develops innovative ideas for its customers in order to meet the consumer demand of the modern world. Our Products 100% cotton compact ring spinning carded yarn from Ne 20 (Nm 34) till Ne 65 (Nm 110)

Raw; This is a list of products manufactured by the enterprise, which are in great demand in Uzbekistan and abroad.
